titleStmt.title: Time is a turne-coate. Or Englands three-fold metamorphosis VVherin is acted the pensiue mans epilogomena, to Londons late lamentable heroicall comi-tragedie. Also a panegyricall pageant-speech or idylion pronounced to the citie of London, vpon the entrance of her long expected comfort. Written by Iohn Hanson.
titleStmt.author: Hanson, John, fl. 1604.

titleStmt.title: Time is a turne-coate. Or Englands three-fold metamorphosis VVherin is acted the pensiue mans epilogomena, to Londons late lamentable heroicall comi-tragedie. Also a panegyricall pageant-speech or idylion pronounced to the citie of London, vpon the entrance of her long expected comfort. Written by Iohn Hanson.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by R. Field] for I. H[anson?] and are to be sold [by G. Potter?] at the signe of the Bible in Paules Church-yard,
